user_query: I'm writing an article about different cultures around the world and I need some diverse examples. Can you fetch random user profiles from different countries and provide me with their names, locations, and pictures? Furthermore, recommend some traditional festivals celebrated in their respective countries using the Linkedin Profile Data API.

TaskList.description: Fetch random user profiles from different countries to get names, locations, and pictures.
For each fetched profile, recommend traditional festivals celebrated in their respective countries.
